posts.title: Takeaways from IBM at SXSW Interactive | Smarter Commerce BlogSmarter Commerce Blog
posts.text: We wrapped up IBM's presence at SXSW Interactive today. I wanted to take a few minutes to catch my breath (and maybe a taco) and review some of the things we've been seeing and hearing here in Austin over the past few days.
posts.message: Check out what @IBM was up to at #SXSWi by @BlairReeves bit.ly/YkBeue #SXSW

posts.title: Exclusive: Behind the Scenes at Cory Booker's Reddit AMA
posts.text: Newark's Cory Booker, America's most social mayor, took part in his second Reddit "Ask Me Anything" Sunday evening; and Mashable was given exclusive behind-the-scenes access as Booker took questions from curious Redditors for more than three hours at Waywire's Manhattan offices.
posts.message: Fresh off #SXSWi the social mayor takes on Reddit AMA. A look behind the scenes with @CoryBooker http:// on.mash.to/WyWGeu

posts.title: Austin2Boston and TheCR Live: Lessons Learned from SXSWi 2013
posts.text: Fleishman-Hillard is partnering with The Community Roundtable to once again keep the SXSW spirit alive in Boston. For the third straight year, we are bringing together smart people to share their stories.
posts.message: A few more tickets left for #Austin2Boston and @TheCR Live: Lessons Learned from #SXSWi 2013 ow.ly/jbzJ5

posts.title: What I learned on my way to SXSW
posts.text: As I write this, I am sitting on a bus with about 25 entrepreneurs from around the Midwest. We took a busload of tech entrepreneurs to the annual South by Southwest Interactive (SXSWi) festival in Austin, Texas.
posts.message: This was all true &quite inspiring@KauffmanFDN:What I learned on my way #SXSW siliconprairienews.com/2013/03/what-i… cc@siliconprairie@cameroncushman #SXSWi
